Sentence.Text: Mr. H is a 65 year old white male with a past medical history significant for an MI and depression who presents today complaining of sharp, epigastric abdominal pain of 3 4 months duration.

Sentence.Text: The abdominal pain has been gradually worsening over the past 3 4 months.
